content:
Would you agree to pre-apply: GF#19239 ?
https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/575
I just removed a bunch of unneeded restrictions on the profile which where duplicates of the base structure (cardinalities) or are causing weird slicing side-effects: profile names on normal elements
Yes - I am fine to pre-apply this change, and we can vote on it next week.
